e1b057cb-5caa-4169-8d45-b2b9fd10ac79.name: Diffuse
e1b057cb-5caa-4169-8d45-b2b9fd10ac79.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

1e5b4885-f889-4110-a339-4ca2fa6a62ed.name: Homogenous
1e5b4885-f889-4110-a339-4ca2fa6a62ed.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

a5acdf31-dda6-4397-8905-4233fc5100fc.name: No Blood
a5acdf31-dda6-4397-8905-4233fc5100fc.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

4d04bf95-96e2-4dcc-abe8-51336218083b.name: No Brain
4d04bf95-96e2-4dcc-abe8-51336218083b.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

c1619d5c-7dc3-4e29-9610-a0b1e093473a.name: No Eyes
c1619d5c-7dc3-4e29-9610-a0b1e093473a.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

d6267d59-a8b6-4b05-a417-ffc928c9e16f.name: No Head
d6267d59-a8b6-4b05-a417-ffc928c9e16f.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

e95ae402-e533-4f86-abff-ec66418b1e40.name: No Neck
e95ae402-e533-4f86-abff-ec66418b1e40.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

b07eaa29-c8e4-4a9a-b705-25b598306ae3.name: No Vitals
b07eaa29-c8e4-4a9a-b705-25b598306ae3.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

2c4a1178-24d8-4c56-bc0a-811fd1ce97cd.name: Unliving
2c4a1178-24d8-4c56-bc0a-811fd1ce97cd.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
